title: libmng fails to build on rzmanta (power 8) when trying to build the default qt qt5 package or in the case below where I tried to build qt@4.8.6.
body:
libmng fails to build on rzmanta (power 8) when trying to build the default qt qt5 package or in the case below where I tried to build qt@4.8.6.

This page doesn't mention doing a "make distclean"
http://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/cvs/general/libmng.html
